alert.note: Alert for Lower Washington County; Southwest Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 30 at 6:54PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Washington and southwestern Iron Counties through 745 PM MDT... At 653 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Quail Creek State Park, or 25 miles west of Zion National Park, moving north at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... St George, Washington, Hurricane, New Harmony, Sand Hollow State Park, Quail Creek State Park, Toquerville, Leeds, Pinto and Pine Valley. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 7 and 25. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
